lead_paragraph: Derided by critics as everything from unconstitutional to sacrilegious, a proposal to designate the Holy Bible as the state’s official book has nevertheless been approved by lawmakers.

headline.main: Tennessee: Bill Making Bible State’s Book Goes to Governor
headline.print_headline: Tennessee: Bill Making Bible State’s Book Goes To Governor

snippet: Derided by critics as everything from unconstitutional to sacrilegious, a proposal to designate the Holy Bible as the state’s official book has nevertheless been approved by lawmakers.
